name: HealMe
0:
”Alexa open heal me”
”begin treatment”
”alexa start heal me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heal me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Heal Me 
-----------

Designed to help you get on a positive track in life and deal with issues such as stress and anxiety using guided meditation, which will walk you through. Start your access to treatments by saying:

begin treatment

To select subject to work on Stress, Hurt, Confidence, Esteem, Motivation, Fear, Anxiety and Illness, say:

I want to work on <stress>
I want to work on <hurt>
I want to work on <confidence>
I want to work on <esteem>
I want to work on <motivation>
I want to work on <fear>
I want to work on <anxiety>
I want to work on <illness>

To select a meditation difficulty level from one of the three (easy, medium, hard). An easier level might be less complex and less involved than a harder one, say:

select <easy> level
select <medium> level
select <hard> level

To navigate through the guided meditation you can move through the steps as follows by saying:

next
back

Be really grateful for feedback. We want to hear comments and suggestions and if you like this Alexa Skill, please rate it and review it. Please also realise, we are going to be working and continually update this skill, so if you there is something you want to include, please let us know by emailing us on healme@jelt.com

Disclaimer

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
